text.content:
Restrained

Source: XPHB, page 373

While you have the Restrained condition, you experience the following effects. Your Speed|XPHB is 0 and can't increase.Attack|XPHB rolls against you have Advantage|XPHB, and your attack rolls have Disadvantage|XPHB.You have Disadvantage|XPHB on Dexterity Saving Throw|XPHB|saving throws.
